title: RADS Error
body: I'm getting this error like many others are.  I've changed the IP address like guides have suggested, and no go.   I turn off my firewall, and no go.   I run as admin and no good.   I'm not sure what else to do.  I'm connected directly in to my router and have no clue why it's not working properly.   It's a netgear nighthawk router.

replies.body:
You've already tried a lot of good first steps to troubleshoot this on your own. At this time, I'd recommend we escalate this to our tech specialists by having you reach out in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you run some system logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your support ticket, your service times will be a bit smoother.

Let me know if you have any issues with those steps.
